transcript.text:
￼



















































Version 11.1 Release Notes

Designer Studio
Change Log

9 min
for you to check precisely, all the notable changes made in the designer studio section in the onprintshop v11 1 release are documented here default theme upgrade the default theme of the designer studio has been upgraded from a solid teal green theme to a gradient theme icons removed from the top panel from the top panel, the below listed icons and buttons have been removed pan now, you can hold and drag the canvas when scroll is available cut intro back button image quality display the setting "display quality check icon in property panel or canvas or both" has been removed from the studio settings now, the image quality will always be displayed on the canvas image reset button removed from image property panel position of the ruler has been changed position of background section the background section has been moved from the left panel to the default property panel color option selection choose colors options moved to the default property panel for promotional products and the front side "more" button removed the "more" button has been removed from all the property panels, and the icons have been adjusted using the left panel zoom functionality changes position of zoom feature changed from top panel to bottom of the screen "enable fit to screen", "zoom interval", and "default zoom" settings from studio settings have been removed
Did this page help you?
